radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal liver shape and contour with normal echogenicity. No focal hepatic lesions. Patent main portal vein with normal hepatopetal flow. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilation. Common bile duct measures 4 mm. Many stones in the gallbladder with significant shadowing. Anterior gallbladder wall appears normal without surrounding pericholecystic fluid or significant thickening. Patient had significant pain with pressure over gallbladder and midline over pancreas. Normal imaged portions of the pancreas.
